title: OnePlus Nord 2 receives Feb 2022 security patches with latest update
content:
After rolling out OxygenOS builds with the Android security patches for January 2022 to the flagship OnePlus 9 series and a couple of OnePlus Nord devices last month, OnePlus has now started rolling out February 2022 patches to its devices. The OnePlus Nord 2 is the first device from the company’s growing smartphone lineup to

The post OnePlus Nord 2 receives Feb 2022 security patches with latest update appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OnePlus has started rolling out a fresh OxygenOS update for the OnePlus Nord 2 featuring the Android security patches for February 2022.
